channel.title: Making a super summon command
channel.description:
For example, im trying to get a ::npc command sorta except it summons the amount i put in.
Like if it was ::massnpc
I could put ::massnpc 907 50
And spawn 50 at a time, kind of like the ::pickup but with npcs.
Im kind of confused how to do this. Could i have some help? I dont need spoonfeeding, just maybe a tip.

item.title: Making a super summon command
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

int id = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
int amount = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);

for (int i = 0; i < amount; i++)

I don’t know the methods in your source so I can’t write it up for you.

Read full topic
